Hydras:

"Actions speaks..."said the male"See what have he did with the lady 
that was figtting with the female minion. I just told the true."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived/ Wolfblade:
>  
> Megatron looked back to Hydras at his accusation.  He walked back 
over and glared at the Predacon leader.
> "What are you talking about?  Are you saying he is one of them?!?!"
>  
> Wolfblade transformed into her beast form and took off towards 
base, arriving sometime later.  She ran in and transformed.  She 
walked into the CR room to help get indlord and Organics situated.
